about: As a full-stack developer, I possess strong problem-solving skills and have collaborated effectively with diverse teams. My leadership abilities enable me to guide and motivate teams towards successful outcomes. I excel at quickly adapting to new technologies, driven by a passion for continuous learning.With over 3 years of experience, I have worked across a range of technologies, demonstrating proficiency in coding standards. Additionally, I have expertise in microservices. My expertise extends to DevOps practices, including deploying solutions for clients on platforms such as Azure, Kubernetes, and DigitalOcean. Additionally, I am well-versed in shell scripting.Currently employed as a senior software developer at Cyber Infrastructure in Indore, I have gained valuable insights and knowledge that have contributed to my professional growth.
